config_ui_counter_enabled_description: Enable display of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_description: Enable custom placement of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_x_description: X position of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_custom_y_description: Y position of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_counter_scale_description: Scale of kill counter and modifier list
config_ui_talisman_mode_enabled_descript: Enable display of current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_descripti: Enable custom placement of current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_x_descrip: X position of current talisman indicator
config_ui_talisman_mode_custom_y_descrip: Y position of current talisman indicator
config_cycling_enabled_description:
Enable Boss Revival.
 The boss will restore health and return to the first phase instead of dying.
config_cycles_number_description:
Boss deaths number.
 Boss will die after this number of deaths(including this one).
config_single_recording_enabled_descript: Record fight results regardless of the configuration. By default, results are created for each unique configuration state (sections 1, 2, 3 are considered), so each configured challenge difficulty has its own results. Enabling this setting will record and use a single result regardless of the challenge settings.
config_boss_deaths_randomized_enabled_de: Enable randomized boss death number. The maximum number of boss deaths will be randomly determined at the start of the battle.
config_boss_deaths_randomized_min_descri: Minimum Deaths: The lowest possible value for the randomized boss death count.
config_boss_deaths_randomized_max_descri: Maximum Deaths: The highest possible value for the randomized boss death count.
config_scaling_enabled_description:
Enable Speed Scaling.
Bosses will gain linear speed scaling with each death. Stacks combined multiplicatively with the random speed scaling.
config_scaling_minspeed_description:
Scaling: Initial Speed.
The starting value for speed scaling.
config_scaling_maxspeed_description:
Scaling: Maximum Speed.
The maximum value for speed scaling.
config_scaling_scaling_cycle_description:
Maximum Speed Scaling After Deaths.
Speed scaling will reach its maximum after this amount of deaths.
config_scaling_modifiers_enabled_descrip:
Enable Modifiers Number Scaling.
Bosses will receive additional modifiers, with the total number being the sum of the scaling and a random scaling value.
config_scaling_maxmodifiers_description:
Scaling: Modifiers Count.
The maximum increase in the number of modifiers.
config_scaling_modifiers_scaling_cycle_d:
Maximum Modifiers Scaling After Deaths.
The increase in modifiers will reach its maximum after this amount of deaths.
config_rand_speed_scaling_enabled_descri:
Enable Random Speed Scaling.
Bosses will receive a random speed boost with each death. Stacks multiplicatively with the linear speed scaling.
config_rand_speed_scaling_start_death_de:
Starting Death for Random Speed Scaling.
The boss will begin receiving a random speed boost after this death.
config_rand_speed_scaling_minspeed_descr:
Random Boost: Minimum speed.
The minimum value for the random speed boost.
config_rand_speed_scaling_maxspeed_descr:
Random Boost: Maximum speed.
The maximum value for the random speed boost.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_enabled_de:
Enable Random Modifiers Scaling.
Bosses will receive a random number of modifiers with each death, added to the linear modifier increase.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_start_deat:
Starting Death for Random Modifiers Scaling.
The boss will begin receiving a random number of modifiers after this death.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_min_descri:
Random Boost: Minimum modifiers.
The minimum value for the random modifiers count.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_max_descri:
Random Boost: Maximum modifiers.
The maximum value for the random modifiers count.
config_rand_speed_scaling_enabled_descri:
Enable Random Speed Scaling.
Bosses will receive a random speed boost with each death. Stacks multiplicatively with the linear speed scaling.
config_rand_speed_scaling_start_death_de:
Starting Death for Random Speed Scaling.
The boss will begin receiving a random speed boost after this death.
config_rand_speed_scaling_minspeed_descr:
Random Boost: Minimum speed.
The minimum value for the random speed boost.
config_rand_speed_scaling_maxspeed_descr:
Random Boost: Maximum speed.
The maximum value for the random speed boost.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_enabled_de:
Enable Random Modifiers Scaling.
Bosses will receive a random number of modifiers with each death, added to the linear modifier increase.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_start_deat:
Starting Death for Random Modifiers Scaling.
The boss will begin receiving a random number of modifiers after this death.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_min_descri:
Random Boost: Minimum modifiers.
The minimum value for the random modifiers count.
config_rand_modifiers_scaling_max_descri:
Random Boost: Maximum modifiers.
The maximum value for the random modifiers count.
config_modifiers_enabled_description:
Enable Modifiers.
 Enable or disable modifiers that affect the boss fight.
config_modifiers_start_death_description:
The death number for modifiers to appear.
 Modifiers will start to apply after this amount of boss deaths. If set to 0, modifiers will be applied at the start of the fight.
config_repeating_enabled_description:
Repeating modifiers.
 Modifiers can be repeated multiple times in a row.
config_modifiers_speed_enabled_descripti:
Speed Modifier.
 +20% boss speed increase. Stacks multiplicatively with speed scaling.
config_modifiers_timer_enabled_descripti:
Timer Modifier.
 Starts a timer to kill the boss. When the time runs out, Yi dies.
config_modifiers_parry_damage_enabled_de:
Modifier to disable imprecise parries.
 Imprecise parries do not protect Yi.
config_modifiers_internal_damage_enabled:
Internal Damage Accumulation Modifier.
 Yi accumulates internal damage over time. In exchange, Yi will not receive internal damage from parries of attacks of the modifier's owner.
config_modifiers_regeneration_enabled_de:
Regeneration modifier.
The enemy will slowly regenerate their health. The total health restored is equal to half of the total health in all phases.
config_modifiers_knockback_enabled_descr:
Knockback modifier.
 Knockback from enemy attacks is doubled.
config_modifiers_knockout_enabled_descri:
Knock out modifier. 
 All attacks that hit apply strongest knock out force to Yi
config_modifiers_random_arrow_enabled_de:
Random arrow modifier.
 The selected arrow changes randomly after shooting. It cannot be changed by player.
config_modifiers_random_talisman_enabled:
Random talisman modifier.
 The selected talisman changes randomly after exlosion. It cannot be changed by player.
(Current talisman mode will display above the selected arrow, it may take few uses to display)
config_modifiers_endurance_enabled_descr:
Endurance modifier.
 Enemy cannot be stunned. The stun after parrying some attacks and Lady Ethereal's stun will still apply.
config_modifiers_qi_shield_enabled_descr:
Qi shield modifier.
 Enemy will receive shield after talisman explosion.
config_modifiers_cooldown_shield_enabled:
Cooldown Shield Modifier.
The enemy will constantly receive a shield with a slight delay.
config_modifiers_distance_shield_enabled:
Distance Shield Modifier.
The enemy will receive a shield if they are far away from the Yi.
config_modifiers_qi_overload_enabled_des:
Qi Overload Modifier.
Gaining Qi charges above the maximum will deal internal damage. If you have no health, the accumulated charges will be lost upon gaining six extra charges. Spending Chi charges resets the extra charges counter.
config_modifiers_yanlao_gun_enabled_desc:
Yanlao's Gun Modifier'.
 Yanlao's gun will target Yi.
config_story_enabled_description: Enables the mod in normal game mode.
config_story_miniboss_cycles_number_desc:
Number of miniboss deaths.
 The miniboss will die after the specified number of deaths (including this one).
config_story_enemy_cycles_number_descrip:
Number of regular enemy deaths.
 The regular enemy will die after the specified number of deaths (including this one).
config_story_affect_bosses_description: Boss enhancement. Bosses will reviwe, gain modifiers and boosts.
config_story_affect_minibosses_descripti: Miniboss enhancement. Minibosses will reviwe, gain modifiers and boosts.
config_story_affect_enemies_description: Regular enemy enhancement. Regular enemies will reviwe, gain modifiers and boosts.
